mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fileupload( file_num, section, common_num, original_file_name, stored_file_name, file_size ) VALUES( file_seq.nextval, #{section}, #{common_num}, #{original_file_name}, #{stored_file_name}, #{file_size} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM fileupload WHERE section = #{section} AND common_num = #{common_num}
mapper.select: SELECT file_num FROM fileupload WHERE section = #{section} AND common_num = #{common_num}
SELECT original_file_name FROM fileupload WHERE section = #{section} AND common_num = #{common_num}
SELECT ROUND(file_size/1024,1) AS file_size FROM fileupload WHERE section = #{section} AND common_num = #{common_num}
SELECT original_file_name FROM fileupload WHERE file_num = #{file_num}
SELECT stored_file_name FROM fileupload WHERE file_num = #{file_num}
